_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_INP_textField
_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: ri!value,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: ri!align
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    value: ri!value,
    /* We are using nested saveIntos to automatically perform a trim on any value */
    /* before executing the actual saves */
    /* Saves can be nested in this format to allow for better reusability */
    saveInto: a!save(ri!saveInto, trim(save!value)),
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    masked: ri!masked,
    validations: if(
      ri!readOnly,
      {},
      a!flatten(
        {
          ri!validations,
          rule!AS_CO_VD_textValidation(value: ri!value, maxLength: ri!maxLength)
        }
      )
    ),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    align: ri!align,
    accessibilitytext: ri!accessibilityText,
    refreshAfter: ri!refreshAfter,
    characterLimit: ri!characterLimit,
    showCharacterCount: ri!showCharacterCount,
    inputPurpose: ri!inputPurpose
  )
)

_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier
_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: {
          ri!fields,
          ri!relatedRecordData.relationship
        },
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set. 

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/

_a-0000ed93-2faa-8000-9dfe-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_initializeEvaluationVendorForUpdate
_a-0000ed93-2faa-8000-9dfe-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  and(
    ri!isVMEnabled,
    a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
      ri!evaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.externalVendorId]
    ),
    tointeger(
      ri!evaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.sourceApplicationId]
    ) = cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_VM
  ),
  a!localVariables(
    local!latestVendorAndDocumentsData: rule!AS_GSS_mapDataFromVMToEvalVendorRecord(
      solicitationNumber: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber],
      startIndex: 1,
      batchSize: 1,
      version: 1,
      externalVendorId: ri!evaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.externalVendorId],
      evaluationId: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId]
    ),
    rule!AS_GSS_UT_consolidateEvaluationVendorForUpdate(
      integrationError: local!latestVendorAndDocumentsData.error,
      existingEvaluationVendor: ri!evaluationVendor,
      latestEvaluationVendor: local!latestVendorAndDocumentsData.data[1]
    )
  ),
  a!map(
    integrationError: null,
    totalDocsFromOpportunity: 0,
    currentEvaluationVendor: ri!evaluationVendor
  )
)

_a-0001ed6e-54f1-8000-9df6-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_CO_INP_dateTimeFieldCustom
_a-0001ed6e-54f1-8000-9df6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!userValue: local(
    a!defaultValue(value: ri!value, default: {})
  ),
  local!date: todate(local!userValue),
  local!time: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(value: ri!value),
    null,
    time(
      hour(local!userValue),
      minute(local!userValue),
      second(local!userValue)
    )
  ),
  local!timeSlots: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_sortArrayDistinct(
    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      array: append(
        a!flatten(
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: enumerate(24) + 1,
            expression: a!localVariables(
              local!currentHour: fv!item,
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                items: enumerate(60 / ri!timeIntervals) * ri!timeIntervals,
                expression: time(local!currentHour, fv!item, 00)
              )
            )
          )
        ),
        local!time
      )
    ),
    ascending: true()
  ),
  if(
    ri!readOnly,
    rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
      label: ri!dateLabel,
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDateTime(dateTime: ri!value),
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
      align: null
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideLayout"(
      spacing: a!defaultValue(value: ri!spacing, default: "DENSE"),
      items: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
          width: "MINIMIZE",
          item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"(
            label: ri!dateLabel,
            labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
              label: ri!dateLabel,
              labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
              readOnly: false
            ),
            instructions: ri!instructions,
            helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
            value: local!date,
            saveInto: {
              a!save(
                ri!value,
                if(
                  a!isNullOrEmpty(value: save!value),
                  {},
                  gmt(
                    datetime(
                      year(save!value),
                      month(save!value),
                      day(save!value),
                      hour(
                        a!defaultValue(value: local!userValue, default: 00)
                      ),
                      minute(
                        a!defaultValue(value: local!userValue, default: 00)
                      ),
                      second(
                        a!defaultValue(value: local!userValue, default: 00)
                      )
                    )
                  )
                )
              ),
              ri!additionalSaves
            },
            showWhen: ri!showWhen,
            required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
            /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
            requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
              label: ri!dateLabel,
              requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
            ),
            readOnly: ri!readOnly,
            disabled: ri!disabled,
            validations: if(ri!readOnly, {}, ri!validations),
            validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
            accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
          )
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
          width: "MINIMIZE",
          item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField_v1"(
            label: ri!timeLabel,
            labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
              label: ri!timeLabel,
              labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
              readOnly: false
            ),
            instructions: ri!instructions,
            helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
            placeholder: ri!timePlaceholder,
            choiceLabels: local!timeSlots,
            choiceValues: local!timeSlots,
            value: local!time,
            saveInto: {
              a!save(
                ri!value,
                if(
                  a!isNullOrEmpty(value: save!value),
                  {},
                  gmt(
                    datetime(
                      year(local!userValue),
                      month(local!userValue),
                      day(local!userValue),
                      hour(save!value),
                      minute(save!value),
                      second(save!value)
                    )
                  )
                )
              ),
              ri!additionalSaves
            },
            showWhen: ri!showWhen,
            required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
            /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
            requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
              label: ri!timeLabel,
              requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
            ),
            disabled: or(
              ri!disabled,
              a!isNullOrEmpty(value: local!date)
            ),
            validations: if(ri!readOnly, {}, ri!validations),
            validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
            accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
          )
        )
      }
    )
  )

_a-0000edca-8e92-8000-9e0b-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_filterRecords
_a-0000edca-8e92-8000-9e0b-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GSS_filterRecords_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

      ),
      submittedDate: rule!AS_GSS_UT_convertDateTimeFromOrToGMT(

        toGmt: true()
      ),
      legalName: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName],
      businessName: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.businessName],
      vendorAddressLine1: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine1],
      vendorAddressLine2: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine2],
      vendorCity: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCity],
      vendorState: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorState],
      vendorCountry: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCountry],
      vendorZipCode: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode],
      vendorZipCodeExt: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt],
      vendorForeignPostalCode: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode],
      duns: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.duns],
      cageCode: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode],
      uniqueEntityId: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId],
      status: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status],
      expirationDate: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate],
      sourceApplication: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.sourceApplicationId],
      isActive: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
      totalPrice: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.totalPrice],
      pricingNotes: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.pricingNotes],
      priceBreakup: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!vendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.priceBreakup],
        expression: a!map(
          itemId: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.itemId],
          evalVendorId: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.evalVendorId],
          itemDescription: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.itemDescription],
          unitPrice: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.unitPrice],
          quantity: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.quantity],
          amount: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.amount],
          isActive: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]
        )
      )

  )
)

_a-0000ed52-a319-8000-9df0-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(
    value: ri!evaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName]
  ),
  {},
  a!flatten(
    rule!AS_GSS_UT_captureMetadataForRecords(
      recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD,
      modifiedBy: ri!initiator,
      createdByField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
      createdOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
      modifiedByField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
      modifiedOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
      isActiveField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      data: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
        records: ri!evaluationVendor,
        modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD(
          recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!evaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
            replacementValue: true()
          ),
          recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.documents: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: ri!evaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.documents],
            expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_captureMetadataForRecords(
              recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD,
              modifiedBy: ri!initiator,
              createdByField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
              createdOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
              modifiedByField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
              modifiedOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
              isDeletedField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.isDeleted,
              data: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
                records: fv!item,
                modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD(
                  recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.isDeleted: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
                    nullableValue: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.isDeleted],
                    replacementValue: false()
                  ),
                  recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorDocumentFactorMapping: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                    items: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorDocumentFactorMapping],
                    expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_captureMetadataForRecords(
                      recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_FactorDocumentMapping_SYNCEDRECORD,
                      modifiedBy: ri!initiator,
                      createdByField: recordType!AS_GSS_FactorDocumentMapping_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
                      createdOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_FactorDocumentMapping_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
                      isActiveField: recordType!AS_GSS_FactorDocumentMapping_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
                      data: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
                        records: fv!item,
                        modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_FactorDocumentMapping_SYNCEDRECORD(
                          recordType!AS_GSS_FactorDocumentMapping_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
                            nullableValue: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_FactorDocumentMapping_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
                            replacementValue: true()
                          )
                        )
                      )
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            )
          ),
          recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.priceBreakup: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
            items: ri!evaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.priceBreakup],
            expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_captureMetadataForRecords(
              recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD,
              modifiedBy: ri!initiator,
              createdByField: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
              createdOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
              modifiedByField: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
              modifiedOnField: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
              data: fv!item
            )
          )
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000ed52-a319-8000-9df0-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_FM_updateEvalVendor
_a-0000ed52-a319-8000-9df0-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!isUploadInProgress: false(),
  local!isImportInProgress: false(),
  local!pendingUploadDocIds,
  local!uploadedTemporaryDocIds,
  local!originalEvaluationVendor: a!refreshVariable(
    value: ri!evaluationVendor,
    refreshOnReferencedVarChange: false()
  ),
  local!isSLGToggleOn: rule!AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableStateAndLocalGovernment_wrapper(),
  local!getMatchingOpportunityFromVM: if(
    cons!AS_GSS_BOL_VENDOR_MANAGEMENT_INTEGRATION_TOGGLE,
    rule!AS_GSS_INT_GET_OpportunityDetailsFromVM(
      solicitationPiid: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber]
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!opportunityDetails: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(local!getMatchingOpportunityFromVM),
    null,
    if(
      local!getMatchingOpportunityFromVM.success,
      rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: local!getMatchingOpportunityFromVM,
        field: "result.body",
        indexDefault: null
      ),
      null
    )
  ),
  local!isVMEnabled: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!opportunityDetails),
    false(),
    cons!AS_GSS_BOL_VENDOR_MANAGEMENT_INTEGRATION_TOGGLE
  ),
  local!defaultFactorId: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!AS_GSS_BL_defaultFactorDocumentMapping(
      evaluation: ri!evaluation,
      evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors: ri!evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: {
      ri!evaluation,
      ri!evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors
    }
  ),
  local!evaluationVendorMap: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_initializeEvaluationVendorForUpdate(
      isVMEnabled: local!isVMEnabled,
      evaluationVendor: ri!evaluationVendor,
      evaluation: ri!evaluation
    ),
    refreshOnReferencedVarChange: false()
  ),
  local!allDocsFromOpportunity,
  local!selectedDocsInImportFromOpportunity,
  local!selectedIndex,
  local!selectedRows,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout_v1"(
    label: "Update Vendor",
    instructions: "Required fields are marked with an asterisk (*)",
    skipAutoFocus: true(),
    contents: {
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_captureVendorDetailsAndDocuments(
        bundle: local!bundle,
        evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors: ri!evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors,
        evaluation: ri!evaluation,
        uploadedTemporaryDocIds: local!uploadedTemporaryDocIds,
        isSLGToggleOn: local!isSLGToggleOn,
        isVmEnabled: local!isVMEnabled,
        selectedVendor: local!evaluationVendorMap.currentEvaluationVendor,
        showWhen: a!isNullOrEmpty(
          local!evaluationVendorMap.integrationError
        ),
        totalDocsFromOpportunity: local!evaluationVendorMap.totalDocsFromOpportunity,
        isUploadInProgress: local!isUploadInProgress,
        isImportInProgress: local!isImportInProgress,
        pendingUploadDocIds: local!pendingUploadDocIds,
        allDocsFromOpportunity: local!allDocsFromOpportunity,
        selectedDocsInImportFromOpportunity: local!selectedDocsInImportFromOpportunity,
        selectedIndex: local!selectedIndex,
        selectedRows: local!selectedRows,
        defaultFactorId: local!defaultFactorId
      ),
      rule!AS_GSS_CRD_displayMessage(
        icon: "exclamation-triangle",
        title: "Integration Error",
        message: "Please try again later or contact your system administrator",
        showWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
          local!evaluationVendorMap.integrationError
        )
      )
    },
    buttons: rule!AS_GSS_BTN_buttonsForUpdateVendorForm(
      bundle: local!bundle,
      buttonAction: ri!buttonAction,
      evaluationVendor: ri!evaluationVendor,
      originalVendorDocuments: local!originalEvaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.documents],
      documentInfo: ri!documentInfo,
      uploadedTemporaryDocIds: local!uploadedTemporaryDocIds,
      pendingUploadDocIds: local!pendingUploadDocIds,
      currentEvaluationVendor: local!evaluationVendorMap.currentEvaluationVendor,
      integrationFailed: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
        local!evaluationVendorMap.integrationError
      ),
      additionalSaves: {
        a!save(
          ri!originalEvaluationVendor,
          rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateEvalVendorRecordWithAllPriceBreakups(
            evalVendor: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluationVendorByIdentifier(
              vendorId: local!originalEvaluationVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorId],
              fields: {
                recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.documents,
                recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.documents
              }
            ),
            executeWhen: true()
          )
        )
      }
    )
  )
)

AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit
_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated(
  originalCdt: ri!oldObject,
  updatedCdt: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(touniformstring(index(ri!auditConfig.complexFields, "fieldName", null))),
    ri!newObject,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
      cdt: ri!newObject,
      fieldValuePairs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!auditConfig.complexFields,
        expression: a!localVariables(
          local!complexFieldAuditConfig: fv!item,
          {
            field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName,
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!newObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
              expression: rule!AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit(
                newObject: fv!item,
                oldObject: if(
                  isnull(ri!oldObject),
                  null,
                  index(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                      cdt: ri!oldObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
                      field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField,
                      value: fv!item[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField]
                    ),
                    1,
                    null
                  )
                ),
                auditConfig: local!complexFieldAuditConfig,
                modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
              )
            )
          }
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
)

_a-0000eb4d-def5-8000-9d18-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_CPS_richTextWithShowMoreLess
_a-0000eb4d-def5-8000-9d18-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!shortenIfLongerThanLen: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
    default: ri!shortenToLen
  ),
  local!showLess: true,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
    label: a!defaultValue(ri!label, null),
    labelPosition: a!defaultValue(ri!labelPosition, "COLLAPSED"),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpToolTip,
    value: a!match(
      value: ri!text,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
        ri!showHyphen = true
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "-", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: or(
        a!isNullorEmpty(ri!shortenToLen),
        ri!shortenToLen = 0
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: fv!value, color: "STANDARD"),
      default: if(
        len(ri!text) <= local!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: ri!text,
          color: "STANDARD",
          size: ri!textSize
        ),
        if(
          local!showLess = true,
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: trim(
                rule!AS_CO_UT_left(text: ri!text, numChars: ri!shortenToLen)
              ) & "... ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "More",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show More",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, false)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          },
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: ri!text & " ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "Less",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show Less",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, true)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          }
        )
      )
    ),
    preventWrapping: ri!preventWrapping,
    tooltip: ri!tooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    align: ri!align,
    marginAbove: ri!marginAbove,
    marginBelow: a!defaultValue(ri!marginBelow, "NONE"),
  )
)

)

_a-0000eb69-8eb8-8000-9d24-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_isBlank
_a-0000eb69-8eb8-8000-9d24-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios, 

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull, 
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

    ),

  )

_a-0000eced-1a08-8000-9dce-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_convertPhaseRecordDataToDictionaryForAudit
_a-0000eced-1a08-8000-9dce-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(
    value: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationPhaseId]
  ),
  {},
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
    value: a!map(
      evaluationPhaseId: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationPhaseId],
      evaluation: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
        value: a!map(
          evaluationId: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId]
        )
      ),
      refPhase: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
        value: a!map(
          taskCategoryId: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.refPhaseId],
          categoryName: index(
            rule!AS_GSS_TMG_QE_getTaskCategories(
              returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT,
              taskCategoryId: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.refPhaseId]
            ),
            "categoryName",
            null
          )
        )
      ),
      duration: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.duration],
      durationUnit: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',
        value: a!map(
          refDataId: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.durationUnit]
        )
      ),
      startDate: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.startDate],
      endDate: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.endDate],
      isActive: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
      /*Metadata from both the CDTs would be the same. Using AS_GSS_Consensus's data here*/
      createdBy: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy],
      createdDatetime: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime],
      modifiedBy: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy],
      modifiedDatetime: ri!phase[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime]
    )
  )
)
